submissions.name: Building Toward Disaster
submissions.creator: The Seattle Times
submissions.description: This graphic was built to let readers look through the history of the tragic 2014 landslide in Washington's Snohomish County. We tied the timeline to aerial photos, allowing readers to see the movement of the river over time, and provided data on the construction, logging, red flags, and attempted fixes. By pivoting to a vertical timeline, it works well on mobile, tablet, and desktop.
